manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Various helper methods and basic concept definitions including lookup, parallel execution and branding support.
This module provides the initial infrastructure that loads all other parts of the application. It cannot be disabled.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The core bootstrap of NetBeans-based applications.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Contains annotations useful for static analysis, such as a @SuppressWarnings usable by FindBugs.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Common annotations, namely for defect detection.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Allows access to file like resources in a way independent on actual OS files. Supports notification of changes on disk.

Many APIs in NetBeans use Lookup as an observable collection of services. The default lookup is the global service registry; selections, project capabilities, and more are also modeled as Lookup instances.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Generic service discovery mechanism used throughout NetBeans.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Allows to get list of installed modules, inspect their properties and dependencies.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: APIs for getting information about installed modules.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.core.netigso > 1.14, org.netbeans.libs.osgi > 1.0, org.openide.modules > 7.11, org.openide.util.ui > 9.3, org.openide.util > 9.3, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.0.0.1

org.netbeans.bootstrap/1 > 2.50, org.netbeans.core.startup/1 > 1.60, org.netbeans.libs.osgi > 1.0, org.openide.modules > 7.25, org.openide.util.ui > 9.3, org.openide.util > 9.3, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.0

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module bundles OW2 ASM (bytecode manipulation library).
This module provides the central additional functionality to Bootstrap to locate and enable the right modules.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.bootstrap/1 > 2.81, org.openide.filesystems > 9.0, org.openide.modules > 7.41, org.openide.util.ui > 9.3, org.openide.util > 9.3, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.1, org.netbeans.libs.asm > 5.0, org.netbeans.core.startup.base = 1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Various helper methods and basic concept definitions related to thick client desktop environment including actions and image handling.
